excludeAppIdList.name: Exclude Application ID List
excludeAppIdList.name[zh_CN]: 应用排除 ID 列表
excludeAppIdList.description: List of application's desktop IDs that should be exclude/hidden from the launchpad.
excludeAppIdList.description[zh_CN]: 需要使 launchpad 排除（避免显示）的应用程序的 desktop ID 列表。

compulsoryAppIdList.name: Compulsory Application ID List
compulsoryAppIdList.name[zh_CN]: 核心必要应用 ID 列表
compulsoryAppIdList.description: The desktop ID list for applications considered as compulsory.
compulsoryAppIdList.description[zh_CN]: 需要被视为核心必要应用的应用 ID 列表。

frequentlyUsedAppIdList.name: Frequently Used Application ID List
frequentlyUsedAppIdList.name[zh_CN]: 常用应用 ID 列表
frequentlyUsedAppIdList.description: The default desktop ID list for "my frequently used" applications.
frequentlyUsedAppIdList.description[zh_CN]: 我的常用中默认显示的应用程序的 desktop ID 列表。

categoryType.name: Application Sort Type
categoryType.description: The type of sorting Application list under windows mode. 0: Alphabetary, 1: DDE Category, 2: Freeform Sort
categoryType.description[zh_CN]: 在窗口模式下排序应用列表的类别。0: 首字母分组排序，1: DDE 风格分类，2: 自由排序

searchByDesktopId.name: searchByDesktopId
searchByDesktopId.name[zh_CN]: 按桌面条目 ID 搜索
searchByDesktopId.description: Whether to allow the search for Desktop ID during the search.
searchByDesktopId.description[zh_CN]: 在搜索时候是否允许搜索Desktop ID。

iconScaleFactor.name: Icon Scale Factor
iconScaleFactor.description: The scale factor for application icons in fullscreen mode.
iconScaleFactor.description[zh_CN]: 全屏模式下应用图标的缩放比例。
